name: 理查德·雷尼
introduction: Born in Aberdeen, Scotland. Richard is known for his work on the comedy series @asst (2018), Bachelor Lions (2019) and the upcoming feature film Claw (2020). Richard started his career as a Dancer and model at the age of 18. He worked for fashion brands including Yves Saint Lauren, Eleven Paris and DIM underwear. As a principle dancer he performed at the world famous cabaret 'Moulin Rouge' in Paris and worked for artists including Duffy and Florence and the Machine. Richard currently lives in Los Angeles.
